Reference

Packages

pak_package_sources

Package sources

pkg_install()

Install a package

pkg_remove()

Remove installed packages

pkg_status()

Display installed locations of a package

Local Package Trees

local_package_trees

Local package trees

local_install()

Install a package tree

local_install_deps()

Install the dependencies of a package tree

local_install_dev_deps()

Install all dependencies of a package tree

Libraries

lib_status()

Status of packages in a library

pak housekeeping

pak_private_library

The pak private library

pak_sitrep()

pak SITuation REPort

pak_setup()

Install pak's dependencies into its private library

pak_cleanup()

Clean up pak caches and/or the pak library
